statements: UPDATE social_media_engagement_metrics SET likes = 100 WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE social_media_engagement_metrics SET comments = 50 WHERE post_id = 2;
UPDATE social_media_engagement_metrics SET shares = 20, engagement_rate = 0.75 WHERE post_id = 3;
UPDATE social_media_engagement_metrics SET likes = likes + 1, comments = comments + 2 WHERE post_id = 1234;
UPDATE social_media_engagement_metrics SET likes = likes + 5, shares = shares + 3 WHERE post_id = 5678;
UPDATE social_media_engagement_metrics SET comments = comments + 1, engagement_rate = (likes + comments + shares) / 3 WHERE post_id = 9101;
UPDATE posts SET likes = likes + 1 WHERE post_id = 1001;
UPDATE users SET followers = followers + 1 WHERE user_id = 2001;
UPDATE posts SET comments = comments + 1 WHERE post_id = 1002;
UPDATE posts SET likes = likes + 1, shares = shares + 2 WHERE post_id = 1001;
UPDATE users SET followers = followers - 10, following = following + 5 WHERE user_id = 2001;
UPDATE posts SET post_content = 'Updated content', comments = comments + 1 WHERE post_id = 1002;
UPDATE SocialMediaPosts SET likes = likes + 1 WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE AudienceEngagement SET likes = likes + 1 WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE ContentStrategyMetrics SET metric_value = metric_value * 1.1 WHERE metric_id = 1;
UPDATE SocialMediaPosts SET likes = likes + 1 WHERE post_id = 12345;
UPDATE AudienceEngagement SET likes = likes * 2, shares = shares + 1 WHERE user_id = 54321 AND post_id = 12345;
UPDATE ContentStrategyMetrics SET metric_value = metric_value * 1.1, date_recorded = '2022-10-15' WHERE metric_id = 98765;
